description.narrative: Strengthen the capacities of MoSYA to enable it to better harness the energy and power of youth & their ability to achieve the SDGs. And to position KWT to play a leadership role in the area of youth empowerment at the regional and intl levels

participating-org.narrative: Gen Sec Suprm Council Plan Dev

activity-description.narrative: Ministry Of Youth - Hamra Tower - Kuwait

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

description.narrative: 1.1 A national policy for youth approved and adopted by government (A national policy for youth: 1- approved, 2-adopted by government.) 1.2 Level of involvement of youth and partners in the formulation of the national youth policy (Level of involvement: 60% of national youth, 20% of NGOs, 20% of Government, and 20% of private sector.) 1.3 Communication and outreach strategy for the implementation of the youth policy developed and staff trained on translating it into action.(Communication and outreach strategy: 1- developed 2- staff trained 3- implemented.) 2.1 Institutional and individual gaps identified within the MoSYA and YPA to effectively engage with youth and respond to their needs and priorities.(Institutional and individual capacity development: 1- gaps are identified, 2- action plan is set, 3-implemented.) 3.1 Number of innovative programmes launched. 3.2 Age and Gender-disaggregate data and indicators 1- developed and 2- published 3.3 Institutionalized volunteerism and leadership programmes initiated.(Institutionalized volunteerism and leadership programs: 1- strategy developed, 2- action plan in place, 3 -implemented, 4-relevant staff are trained.) 4.1 Number of regional and global events in celebration of Kuwait Capital of Youth attended. 4.2 Number of events and activities positioning Kuwait regionally and globally.

comment.narrative: Output Target 1.1 Support the development and formulation of national youth policy in line with the Kuwait National Development Plan (KNDP) priorities and aligned with the respective SDGs. Output Target 1.2 Support in identification of key interventions in the form of UN system wide review of the drafting of the national youth policy including based on its best practices and lessons learned. Output Target 1.3 Prepare a communication strategy and action plan to enhance networking for the implementation of the national youth policy. Output Target 1.4 Establish a multi-stakeholder guidance and oversight board to manage implementation of the action plan and communication strategy. Output Target 1.5 Train the staff of the Ministry on communications and networking skills. Output Target 2.1 Support development of an expertise and talent roster on youth development to advance efforts in the field of youth development in Kuwait. Output Target 3.1 Two technical papers to support the Kuwaiti government as they integrate the youth related SDGs into the national and local strategies and policies. Output Target 3.2 Provide two effective, demand-driven, content-specific and evidence-based studies informing Kuwaiti policy and advise on the linkages between the State Vision Kuwait 2035, the Five- year reform program to improve the quality of General Education (2015-2020) and respective SDGs. Output Target 3.3 provide technical expertise for the establishment of a national youth volunteer scheme to be implemented through the Ministry. Output Target 4.1 Support positioning Kuwait globally through establishing UN youth delegates program.

Output Target 1.1 : Achieved. Output Target 1.2 : Achieved. Output Target 1.3 : Not Achieved. Output Target 1.4 : Achieved. Output Target 1.5 : Achieved. Output Target 2.1 : Achieved. Output Target 3.1 : Achieved. Output Target 3.2 : Achieved. Output Target 3.3 : Achieved. Output Target 4.1 : Achieved.
